email_body: ok. i would not describe him as the hardest working man in the energy business. slafontaine@globalp.com on 03/02/2001 08:54:44 AM To: jarnold@enron.com cc: Subject: silverman i say we make a pact, next time silver man calls in sick on a friday after a typical nite out you and i cut him off for the entire next week. deal?
